review: I've waited six months to review this so I could safely say it's very mediocre. It does get everything it claims to but only when it's able to pick up your internet. I've had constant issues with it dropping my wifi signal. I've even bought a booster just to make it stronger! If you aren't using this right beside your router, good luck.
author: MLF

review: I am having trouble with it staying connected to my wifi connection.  when I check the status it says connected but when I try to watch something or view something it tells me it can't connect to my network.  I'm not sure about this so far.
author: Antoinette Peele
